page.title: 17Farms.
page.content:
Most of the farms in the area were dairy farms but many are turning over to half dairy and half arable because of the government policy to cut milk production.
Farmers have been told to cut their milk production by 7%.
We visited Cary's Farm.They have 110 acres and 100 cows. They exceeded their milk quota but were not penalised because the national milk production was lower. They have been told to cut by a further 1% this year. They are worried because their land is not suitable for arable farming. They buy corn for their cow feed direct from Mr. Tucker who has 70 acres of arable land. He also has 2000 pigs including 230 breeding sows.
